properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 9:45AM CST until February 13 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a Flood
Warning for the following areas in Texas...

Denton Creek Near Justin Affecting Denton County

The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Denton Creek Near Justin.
* until late tonight...Or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 0900 AM Wednesday the stage was 8.89 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river should rise above flood stage by late
Wednesday morning and continue to rise to a crest near 10 feet by
Wednesday afternoon. The river should fall below flood stage by
late Wednesday afternoon.
* At 10 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur to farm and ranch
lands near the creek.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Stay tuned to NOAA All Hazards Radio for the latest river forecasts.
